# Copilot Instructions for Agents

The files in this repository are intended to seed new projects with a consistent set of guidelines and starter templates for Python-based projects.

## `guidelines.md`

This file is intended to be installed as a coding agent's baseline instructions.

## `starter.md`

This file is intended to be a monolithic prompt to give the agent in a fresh empty directory to have it generate a new project structure from scratch, that will be compatible with the guidelines.
